lead_paragraph: Confirming rumors that circulated on Friday, Condé Nast announced on Monday that Adam Rapoport has been named the next editor-in-chief of Bon Appétit. Read the full post on the Diner's Journal blog.
snippet: Prior to being named editor-in-chief of Bon Appétit, Mr. Rapoport worked at GQ, Time Out New York and the James Beard Foundation.

headline.main: Adam Rapoport Will Lead Bon Appétit

abstract: Prior to being named editor-in-chief of Bon Appétit, Mr. Rapoport worked at GQ, Time Out New York and the James Beard Foundation.
